show_name: Detective Conan: Conan and Heiji and the Vanished Boy (OAV)
other_title: Meitantei Conan: Conan to Heiji to Kieta Shounen (Japanese)
名探偵コナン: コナンと平次と消えた少年 (Japanese)
plot: Conan and Ran are visiting Heiji and Kazuha in Osaka but while they are touring around they come across a group of three kids that look like Ayumi, Mitsuhiko, and Genta. The group are looking for their missing friend and Conan agrees to help.
